items.name: Black Sands
items.summary: Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut
items.desc:
Black Sands - Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut
Blacks Sands is a pitch black Imperial Stout with cinnamon and coconut. It delivers initial flavours of cinnamon which then blends with the coconut, developing into a candied sweetness from the lactose and vanilla, with underlying notes of chocolate.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Lactose, Hops, Yeast, Ceylon Cinnamon, Toasted Coconut Flakes, Cacoa Nibs, Vanilla, Fenugreek
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Captivating Creek
items.summary: Double Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
items.desc:
Captivating Creek - Double Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
Captivating Creek has double the fruit and double the ABV of it's little sibling Curious Creek.
With a slightly thicker mouthfeel and a jammier fruit profile, Captivating Creek is similar enough to remind us of the Curious Creek we love but a whole new beer in itself!
ABV: 6.4%
Size: 440ml
Contains: Water, Wheat, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Raspberries and Cherries.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Chameleon Passion
items.summary: Imperial Passion Fruit Sour
items.desc:
Chameleon Passion - Imperial Passion Fruit Sour
Chameleon Passion is an imperial sour beer refermented on passionfruit. The simple, neutral base beer allows the naturally tart fruit to shine in this crisp and refreshing sour.
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Wheat, Hops, Yeast, and Passion Fruit.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Coconut Crater
items.summary: Imperial Milk Stout with coconut, cacao and vanilla
items.desc:
Coconut Crater - Imperial Milk Stout with coconut, cacao and vanilla
We brewed a big Imperial Milk Stout and infused it with a healthy dose of toasted coconut and a pleasant amount of cacao and vanilla for a thick and decadent treat.
12.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Lactose, Hops, Yeast, Toasted Coconut Flakes, Cacao Nibs and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Colossal Creek
items.summary: TripleÂ Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
items.desc:
Colossal Creek - Triple Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
Colossal creek is an experimental Triple Berliner Weisse. We took our 'Curious Creek' recipe and tripled everything. Three times the grist, three times the ABV and three times the amount of fruit. Re-fermented on nearly 3/4 Tonne of Raspberries and cherries this beer is fruity, tart and full on.
ABV: 9.6%
Size: 440ml
Contains: Water, Wheat, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Raspberries and Cherries.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Curious Creek
items.summary: Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
items.desc:
Curious Creek - Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries
Curious Creek was our first Berliner Weisse and is fruited with 125g/l of raspberries & cherries. It's bright, tart and crisp, and at only 3.2% this sour beer is distinctive, refreshing and packs a punch.
ABV: 3.2%
Size: 440ml
Contains: Water, Wheat, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Raspberries and Cherries.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Dark River
items.summary: Imperial Porter
items.desc:
Dark River - Imperial Porter
Dark River pours jet black with a tight tan head. This imperial porter boasts flavours of sweet toffee, dark chocolate and light coffee notes, rounded off with a silky smooth mouthfeel and a low level of carbonation, and finishing with a comforting warmth from the 14% ABV.
14.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Hops and Yeast.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Deep Bloom
items.summary: Imperial Black Ice Cream IPA With Chocolate & Strawberries
items.desc:
Deep Bloom - Imperial Black Ice Cream IPA With Chocolate & Strawberries
It's back! Same great recipe, just a slight tweak to the name.
We love brewing big flavoursome Imperial Milkshake IPAs and this is no exception. We decided to reincarnate an old trendy beer style - the Black IPA! - with our own Wander Beyond twist. Dry hopped with El Dorado and brewed with strawberries, cacao nibs and vanilla. This beer is creamy, bold and lush. The artwork explores the idea of ice cream jellyfish, and a group of jellyfish is called a bloom.
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Lactose, Wheat, El Dorado Hops, Yeast, Strawberry, Peruvian Cacao Nibs and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Dolis
items.summary: Imperial Stout with Peruvian cacao and vanilla
items.desc:
Dolis - Imperial Stout with Peruvian cacao and vanilla
Dolis is brewed with a combination of specialty malts, Peruvian cacao nibs and vanilla to create a rich and luxurious imperial stout. Strong flavours of dark chocolate and roasted malt characteristics contrast with sweeter notes of vanilla.
The name and artwork for Dolis is inspired by our designer Tina's favourite moorland crag and one of it's classic f6c boulder problems. Tina enjoyed this climb so much at the weekend, she came to work on Monday and put it on a can! This technical climb has a mix of strong and flexy moves but she says it's the beautiful isolated location that gives it its charm.
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Hops, Yeast, Peruvian Cacao Nibs and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Entangle
items.summary: Single Hop SimcoeÂ Imperial Milkshake IPA
items.desc:
Entangle - Single Hop Simcoe Imperial Milkshake IPA
Loosely based around the Illicium recipe, Entangle is a single hopped imperial milkshake IPA with Simcoe hops. With plenty of oats and lactose for a silky body, the Simcoe hops compliment the sweetness with flavours of orange and pine.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose, Hops, Yeast and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Fragariopod
items.summary: Imperial Milkshake IPA with Alphonso Mangoes and Strawberries 12.0%
items.desc:
Fragariopod - Imperial Milkshake IPA with Alphonso Mangoes and Strawberries 12.0%
Vegetarian Friendly
Fragariopod is another iteration of our popular imperial milkshake IPAs. Brewed to 12% and refermented on mangoes and strawberries with the punchy mosaic dry hop, expect tropical smoothie flavours, ripe fruits and juice.
12.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose, El Dorado & Mosaic Hops, Yeast, Alphonso Mangoes, Strawberries and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Imperial Anura
items.summary: Imperial Blueberry Berliner Weisse
items.desc:
Imperial Anura - Imperial Blueberry Berliner Weisse
Imperial Anura is an Imperial Blueberry Berliner Weisse re-fermented on 300g/l of blueberries. This deep, dark, purple beer is ripe and bursting with tart blueberry fruit.
Imperial Anura is a step up from the original Anura, packed with even more blueberries and an increase in ABV.
12.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Wheat, Hops, Yeast and Blueberry.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Lutra Lutra
items.summary: Pale Ale
items.desc:
Lutra Lutra - Pale Ale
Lutra Lutra is a straight forward easy drinking pale ale. A nice simple malt based combined with a modest level of hops to create a no fuss, quaffable, slightly hazy, pale ale.
5.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Mango Monkeys
items.summary: Imperial Mango Berliner Weisse
items.desc:
Mango Monkeys - Imperial Mango Berliner Weisse
Mango Monkeys pours a deep orange-gold colour with a white head. The sourness of this berliner weisse is balanced with the natural sweetness from the addition of half a tonne of mangos (250g/L). This is a big hitter at 13.0%, yet itâs still refreshing and leaves you with the lovely tropical taste of mangoes to savour.
13.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Wheat, Hops, Yeast and Mango.
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Maple Dream
items.summary: Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout
items.desc:
Maple Dream - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout
Maple Dream is a progression on the base ideas used in a previous gluten-free, lactose-free Imperial Sweet Stout that we brewed back in November 19, Leap. With some recipe adaptations and additions, this time we have created a Maple Imperial Stout which is still gluten-free and lactose-free, accessible to coeliacs, people with lactose and other gluten intolerance's, vegans and people who enjoy a good ol' Imperial Stout.
10.0% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats. Gluten free, tested bellow 20ppm
Vegan friendly

items.name: Mixed 12 pack
items.desc:
Mixed 12 pack
Case contains 12x 440ml cans.
Fragariopod - Imperial Milkshake IPA with Alphonso Mangoes and Strawberries, 12.0%
Octopod - Imperial Milkshake IPA with Alphonso Mangoes and Passionfruit, 12.0%
Entangle - Single Hop Simcoe Imperial Milkshake IPA, 10.0%
Deep Bloom - Imperial Black Icecream IPA with chocolate and strawberries, 11.0%
Dolis - Imperial Stout with Peruvian cacao and vanilla, 11.0%
Ozzy - Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao, 11.0%
Maple Dream - Gluten-free, Lactose-free Maple Imperial Stout, 10.0%
Chameleon Passion - Imperial Passion Fruit Sour, 11.0%
Imperial Anura - Imperial Blueberry Berliner Weisse, 12.0%
Curious Creek - Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries, 3.2%
Captivating Creek - Double Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries, 6.4%
Colossal Creek - Triple Berliner Weisse with raspberries and cherries, 9.6%

items.name: Octopod
items.summary: Imperial Milkshake IPA with mango and passionfruit
items.desc:
Octopod - Imperial Milkshake IPA with mango and passionfruit
Octopod is a hyper-viscous Imperial Milkshake IPA with a good helping of lactose and vanilla. Re-fermented on over half a tonne (more than 300g/l) of alphonso mangoes and passionfruit. Generously dry hopped post-fermentation with both Citra and Mosaic T90 hops.
We have decided to release this batch super fresh to give you an opportunity to try Octopod as fresh as possible and in all itâs hoppy glory, before the âhop burnâ and some of the more volatile hop characteristics mellow out, leaving the Octopod you know and love.
We are excited to hear your folks opinions on whether you prefer Octopod super fresh with the more dominant hop profile or if you enjoy it more once it has softened and all the big punchy flavours have had a chance to meld together. Get back to us and let us know what you think.
12.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Lactose, Hops, Yeast, Alphonso Mango, Passionfruit and Vanilla.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly

items.name: Ozzy
items.summary: Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
items.desc:
Ozzy - Imperial Stout with tonka, star anise, vanilla and cacao
Ozzy pours pitch black with a tan head, giving off aromas of tonka beans and star anise. Upon your first mouthful you are met with big upfront hits of liquorice and aniseed, which then fades into notes of dark chocolate and vanilla. Ozzy has a smooth and soft level of carbonation which is accompanied on the way down by a hint of heat making sure you donât forget itâs 11.0%. As you continue to drink Ozzy it becomes more and more morish.
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Hops, Yeast, Tonka Beans, Star Anise, Vanilla and Cacao Nibs
Allergens in bold
Vegan friendly

items.name: Peak
items.summary: Pale Ale
items.desc:
Peak - Pale Ale
This beer normally doesn't travel much further than Manchester as it is primarily brewed for cask. However we're excited to release this can version for you to enjoy both in Manchester or further afield.
3.8% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Ramble
items.summary: Session Pale Ale
items.desc:
Ramble - Session Pale Ale
Ramble is a light sessionable pale ale coming in at 4.2% ABV. A light malt character balanced with a subtle dry hop ensures the sessionable drinkability of this pale ale.
4.2% ABV
440ml
Allergens: Barley, Oats, Wheat
Vegan friendly

items.name: Split
items.summary: Banana Split Imperial Black Ice Cream IPA
items.desc:
Split - Banana Split Imperial Black Ice Cream IPA
Split is an imperial black ice cream IPA with bananas inspired by the popular dessert. We used lots of oats and banana chips in the mash, added Peruvian cacao nibs to up the chocolate notes, a good amount of vanilla for that icecream sweetness, dry-hopped it with fruity Azacca hops and re-fermented it on even more banana to finish. Enjoy in a glass or over ice cream!
11.0% ABV
440ml
Contains: Water, Malted Barley, Oats, Wheat, Lactose, Azacca Hops, Yeast, Peruvian Cacao Nibs, Vanilla and Banana.
Allergens in bold
Vegetarian friendly
